assumes.post_str: The undersigned is directed to pay that with effect from the 20th July 2011 Shri assumed the additional charge of the office of the Minister of State Ministry of Parliamentary Affairs He will continue to hold the charge of the office of the Minister of State (Independent Charge) of the Ministry of Development of North Eastern Region
